FOUR! Class written all over that shot! Richard Ngarava comes from over the wicket and bowls it much fuller, just outside off and swings it a bit away. Najmul Hossain Shanto drives it past the wide mid off fielder for a boundary.
On a back of a length, on off, Mominul Haque steers it off the back foot to point.
Fuller, on off, Mominul Haque defends it right under his eyes.
Angling in, on off, on a short of a length, Haque leaves the ball alone.
On a back of a length, on middle, Mominul Haque hangs back to defend.
Bangs it into the deck, over off, Haque ducks under it.
From around the wicket, on a good length, outside off, Mominul Haque shoulders arms.
Attacking the front pad, on a length, Najmul Hossain Shanto keeps it out on the leg side.
On middle, on a good length, Najmul Hossain Shanto pats it back to Richard.
In the channel on off, on a length, Najmul Hossain Shanto lets it pass.
On a good length, seaming away late, on off, Shanto is squared up in defence and the ball rolls towards gully off the outer half of the bat.
Pitched up, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks it out off the front foot.
On the pads, on a length, Shanto clips it past square leg for a couple of runs.
Slanting into the pads, on a length, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes for the flick. Gets an inside edge onto the pads and a single is taken as the ball rolls away on the off side.

OUT! TAKEN! The short ball ploy works for Zimbabwe! Dropped yesterday when he was on 6, Blessing Muzarabani finally manages to see the back of Mahmudul Hasan Joy. Bends his back and serves a sharp and quick bumper around the right shoulder of the batter. It keeps climbing onto Joy, who is late in getting his bat and gloves out of the way. The ball catches the shoulder of the bat and goes straight to first slip where Craig Ervine does the rest. Joy goes for 33 (65). Bangladesh are now 73/2, trailing by 9 runs.
Mahmudul Hasan Joy c C Ervine b B Muzarabani 33 (65b 6x4 0x6)
Lands it on a length, on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy is rooted to the crease and dabs it to cover.
An effort ball at the ribs of the batter, Mahmudul Hasan Joy drops his wrist and wears it on the arm.
On a length, on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy pats it back to the bowler.
Digs it in short with a short leg in place. Mahmudul Hasan Joy ducks under it.
Sliding onto the pads, on a length, clipped to mid on.
Banged into the deck, on off, Mominul Haque arches back to ramp it over the keeper but misses.
FOUR! Fine shot! A bit too full from Richard Ngarava, on middle, Mominul Haque gets on the front foot and plays the check drive to the right of mid on for a boundary. The deficit is now 9 runs.
A harmless delivery, wide on off, Mominul Haque offers no shot.
Just around the off stump, on a length, Mominul leaves the ball alone.
On a back of a length, outside off, Mominul Haque shoulders arms.
FOUR BYES! This takes off from a back of a length, over off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy hurriedly sways away. The ball flies over the leaping keeper, Nyasha Mayavo for a boundary.
Blessing Muzarabani varies his length as this is on the off stump, on the fuller side, Mahmudul Hasan Joy presents a straight bat to defend.
Short again but slightly down leg, Mahmudul Hasan Joy ducks under it.
On a shortish length, around the right shoulder of the batter. This climbs onto the batter but Joy does well to sway away and drop his wrists.

This nips back in and kicks up a bit off the deck, on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy hags his bat out to defend but gets beaten on the inside edge as the ball sneaks past the blade and catches him on the thigh pad.
On a hard length, outside off, Joy lets it pass.
On a back of a length, on middle, Mominul Haque keeps it out on the leg side.
Drifting into the pads, Mahmudul Hasan Joy glances it down to deep fine leg for one.

BUZZERS! On a length, on off, Mominul Haque pushes it in front of cover and sets off for a quick single. The fielder has a shy at the bowling end but there is no one to back up the throw. Wellington Masakadza is caught ball-watching and eventually gives it a chase and cuts it off. Two more runs taken due to the overthrow. The 50-run stand comes up. Bangladesh trail by 18 runs.
A full ball which seams away, inviting the drive. Mominul Haque resists and lets it through.
Slightly fuller, moving away, on off, Haque leaves the ball alone.
Lands it on a good length, outside off, Mominul Haque makes a watchful leave.
A bit too wide on off, on a short of a length, Joy offers no shot.
On a good length, around off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy shoulders arms.
Dug in short, over off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy ducks and lets it pass.
Full and attacking the stumps. This seams away late, Mahmudul Hasan Joy is a bit squared up as he looks to drive it down the ground. Gets it off the outer half to cover.
At 133.3 kph, on a good length, on off, Joy gets forward to defend.
On a back of a length, on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy stabs it down off the back foot.
On the off stump, on a length, blocked out by Mominul Haque.
Pulls the length back, outside off, Haque lets it pass.
Pitched up, a hint of away shape, Mominul Haque is drawn forward in defence. Gets an outside edge that goes on the bounce to Brian Bennett at gully.
In the channel on off, on a length, Mominul Haque shoulders arms.
Bashes the hard length, on off, the ball climbs onto the batter. Mahmudul Hasan Joy rises with the bounce and drops it beside the pitch on the off side for a quick single.
Pushed across the batter from over the wicket, Joy lets it through.
Seaming back in, on a good length, on off, Mominul Haque leaves the ball alone.
A tempter from Blessing, full and wide on off, Mominul Haque lets it be.
From around the wicket, on a good length, on off, Mominul Haque solidly defends.
A yorker speared in at the toes, Mahmudul Hasan Joy jams it out to deep fine leg for one.
Full and slanting into the pads, Mahmudul Hasan Joy turns it off the pads towards deep square leg for a couple of runs.
Charges in from over the wicket and hits the bat hard, over off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy hops and keeps it out.
Length ball on off, Mominul Haque gets right behind the line of that ball as he defends it solidly off the back foot back to the bowler. AND THAT WILL BE STUMPS ON DAY 2.
Length ball, seaming into the left hander on off, Mominul Haque pats it to catching mid on.
FOUR! CUT AWAY! Back of a length just outside off, enough for Mominul Haque to free his arms as he cuts it late, behind square to the deep backward point region for four.
Length ball outside off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy stands tall and cuts it square of the wicket, along the ground to deep point for a single.
Length ball angling into the right hander, on middle stump, Mahmudul Hasan Joy nicely defends it off the front foot to catching mid on.
Back of a length around off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy punches it off the back foot to short cover. No run.
A touch full again, on middle, Mominul Haque gets behind the line of the ball as he defends it back to the bowler.
Full and sliding down leg, Mominul Haque looks to flick it but can't get any bat on it.
Full moving away in the channel outside off, Mominul Haque lets it go.
Back of a length, on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy pushes it wide of cover for a single.
Back of length delivery, well outside off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy punches it to short extra cover.
Good length, outside off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy defends it into the off side to short cover. No run.
On a length and angling into the right hander around leg stump, Mahmudul Hasan Joy looks to flick it and misses as the ball hits his pad and goes down the leg side. Batters run a leg bye.
Slower length ball on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy defends it carefully into the off side.
Good length around off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy blocks it solidly off the front foot.
Full and swinging into the right hander, Mahmudul Hasan Joy looks to play the drive, and gets an inside edge and wears it on his pads.

FOUR! Back-to-back boundaries for Mahmudul Hasan Joy. Bangladesh batters are playing their shots. This is a harmless length delivery, well outside off, asking the batter to put away. Mahmudul Hasan Joy cuts it fiercely, square of the wicket to send the ball to the boundary.
FOUR! Back of a length angling into the right hander, on off stump, Mahmudul Hasan Joy flays at the delivery and it goes just over the leaping Ben Curran at third slip.

Victor Nyauchi switches to round the wicket and lands it on a length. The line is in the channel outside off, as Mominul Haque judges the line perfectly and makes the right decision to leave it alone.
Good length angling across the left hander, Mominul Haque lets it go.
FOUR! Short and hammered! Back of a length delivery well outside off, Mominul Haque frees his arms as he cuts it through the point region for four.

A touch fuller, outside off, asking the batter to go for the drive, Mominul Haque doesn't bother accepting the offer as he lets it go. Interestingly, the ball rises off the full length and the keeper collects it near his head. Variable bounce on display.
Length ball, outside off, Mominul Haque defends it off the back foot to point.
Length ball sliding down the leg side. Mominul Haque looks to flick it, but can't get any bat on it as the ball goes to the keeper.

Richard Ngarava stretches his back and hits the deck hard. This ball generates good bounce and goes through off stump line to the keeper. The batter was not interested in playing that one, as he left it alone.
On a length, on middle-leg, Mahmudul Hasan Joy blocks it off the back foot.
Back of a length outside off, Mominul Haque pushes it to the right of point and sets off for a quick single.
Length ball that rises a bit off the surface and seams away, in the channel outside off. Mominul Haque has a poke at it as he gets beaten on the outside edge.
A touch fuller, in the channel outside off, moving away. Mominul Haque watches it carefully as he leaves it alone.
Length ball on middle, a touch inward movement there. Mominul Haque blocks it nicely into the leg side.
Back of a length and on middle, Mahmudul defends it off the back foot. No run.
FOUR! Class from Mahmudul Hasan Joy! Full, half volley on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy leans a bit on his front foot and drives through the line to the long off region for four.
Full and sliding down leg, Mahmudul Hasan Joy looks to flick it but can't get any bat on it as the ball goes to the keeper.
Blessing Muzarabani goes short, but gets the line wrong, as the ball goes down the leg side. Mahmudul Hasan Joy ducks under it as the keeper comfortably collects it to his left.
A touch fuller, angling into the right-hander, on off stump, Mahmudul Hasan Joy gets right behind the line of the ball and defends it solidly into the offside.
Full on middle, Mahmudul Hasan Joy defends it solidly to the left of the bowler.
FOUR! Poor delivery and gets the treatment! Full, just outside off, Mominul Haque sees the opportunity and drives this one fiercely through covers for four.
Good leave that! A touch fuller, jagging into the left hander, goes millimetres past the off stump. Mominul Haque leaves it alone.
Full delivery outside off, that doesn't swing and goes with the angle. Mominul Haque has no hesitance in leaving it alone.
Length ball angled in on off stump, Mominul Haque defends it from the crease. No run.
Fuller this time, in the channel outside off, swinging away, Mominul Haque leaves it alone.
Back of a length moving away, outside off, Mominul Haque opens the face of the bat and guides it through the gully region for two runs.

FOUR! More salt into the wounds! Pitched up by Blessing Muzarabani, on off, Mahmudul Hasan Joy leans ahead and drives it past the diving mid off fielder to his right for a boundary. Bangladesh trail by 55 runs!
Sprayed down leg, on a length, Joy misses the tickle.
Dug in short, over middle and leg, Mahmudul Hasan Joy ducks under it. Nyasha Mayavo collects it with a leap.
Fullish, around off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy fends it away.
On a length, at the stumps. Mahmudul Hasan Joy leans and blocks it out.

DROPPED, FOUR! Oh, that should have been taken behind the stumps! Blessing Muzarabani is furious because of the dropped catch! Bowls it touch fuller, pitching it just outside off, angling it in but before it nips away late. Mahmudul Hasan Joy looks to play at it but gets a slight outside edge. The keeper, Nyasha Mayavo reacts a bit slow and the ball ends up getting big on him. Gets both his hands together to his right to take it but fails to cling on.
On a length, on middle. Mominul Haque shuffles across the stump and clips it toward mid on.
Pitches it up, but down the leg. Mominul Haque attempts to flick but fails to connect.
Short of a length, outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy cuts it toward the point fielder, who makes a half stop, which allow the batters to take a single.
Fuller, outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy fends it away.

FIVE WIDES! Victor Nyauchi unable to control the swing of the delivery! Back of a length, pitching it wide outside off and swinging it away. Nyasha Mayavo behind the stumps makes a dive, gets a glove on it but it is not enough as the ball goes through the slip cordon for a boundary.
Good-length delivery, outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy slaps it hard but straight to the man in the cover region.
Back of a length, wide outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy covers the stumps and makes a leave.
Fuller now, on off. Mominul Haque lunges and blocks it out.
Back of a length, wide outside off. Mominul Haque defends inside the line and misses with a huge gap.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! Shadman Islam departs for another low score. Blessing Muzarabani steams in from around the wicket and makes the batter play, on the off stump, on a length, Shadman Islam hangs his bat out in front to defend but the ball nibbles away to catch the outside edge. It goes low towards second slip where Sean Williams stays low to snaffle it.
Shadman Islam c S Williams b B Muzarabani 4 (10b 1x4 0x6)
This is down the off side and let through.
Shadman Islam lets the ball go outside the off stump.
FOUR! Edgy! On a back of a length, outside off, Shadman Islam throws his hands at the ball. Gets an outside edge and it flies down to deep third for a boundary.

This is Victor Nyauchi at his best! Bowls it on a good length, pitching it just outside off and the ball jags back in sharply. Mahmudul Hasan Joy plays all around it and gets thumped on the pad. Zimbabwe take the review. The UltraEdge shows no bat involvement but the Ball Tracking shows that the ball is going past the leg stump. Zimbabwe lose a review.
Short of a length, wide outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy offers no shot.

Excellent bowling from Victor Nyauchi! Touch fuller, pitching just outside off, angling in but then it nips away from the batter. Mahmudul Hasan Joy is drawn forward and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Pitches it up, outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy strides out and fends it toward off side.
Back of a length, angling down the leg. Mahmudul Hasan Joy looks to flick but misses.
Fuller, just outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy knocks it toward cover.
Yorker, on the pads of the batter. Mahmudul Hasan Joy digs it toward his leg side for a single.
FOUR! The first one of the inning! Much fuller now, on middle and leg. Mahidul Islam Ankon closes the face of the bat in time to tuck it past square leg for a boundary.
Appeal for LBW, but turned down! Blessing Muzarabani bowls it on a hard length, on middle and leg. Mahidul Islam Ankon attempts to defend it down but gets a bit of inside edge onto his pad.
On a length, just outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy lunges and blocks it from the crease.
Fuller, outside off. Mahmudul Hasan Joy leans forward and fends it away.
Blessing Muzarabani comes from over the wicket and bowls on a length, angling down the leg. Mahmudul Hasan Joy hangs back and looks to dab it toward his leg side but misses and wears on his pad.
Pushed across the left-hander, on the fuller side, Shadman Islam leaves the ball alone.
Going across, on a length, left alone by Shadman Islam.
On a length, outside off. Shadman Islam prods and defends it toward backward point for no runs.
FOUR BYES! Bangladesh are underway! Back of a length, well down leg, out of the reach of the keeper. Shadman Islam offers no shot at it and the ball rolls away towards the fence.
On a length, angling across. Shadman Islam looks to cut, but the ball stays low after it pitches on the track and sneaks under the bat.
Into the blockhole, right away! Victor Nyauchi bowls in the yorker length, outside off. Shadman Islam jams it out.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND TAKEN! Mehidy Hasan Miraz has completed the job to get the last wicket as well and has picked up a five-fer! Mehidy Hasan Miraz comes from over the wicket with the new ball and bowls it fuller, just outside off. Victor Nyauchi crouches a bit and looks to go big toward deep mid-wicket but ends up getting the top edge. The ball balloons toward the cover region and Taijul Islam makes no mistake to take that skier safely into his hands.
Victor Nyauchi c T Islam b MH Miraz 7 (18b 0x4 0x6)
Flat and full, just outside off. Richard Ngarava punches it toward long off for one.
Fuller, outside off. Victor Nyauchi brings out his solid defense.
Tossed up, on middle and leg. Victor Nyauchi works it toward square leg.
Flatter and fuller, just outside off. Victor Nyauchi gets behind the delivery and fends it down to the track.
Drags his length back, on middle, angling into the left-hander. Richard Ngarava rocks back and tickles it toward fine leg for one.
Tossed up, just outside off. Richard Ngarava eases it away.
Goes fuller, on off. Richard Ngarava lunges and defends.
Slower, fuller on off. Victor Nyauchi drives it back to the bowler.
Fuller delivery, on off. Victor Nyauchi blocks it low.
Pitches it up, around off. Victor Nyauchi leans on the delivery and drives it past cover for a couple.
Fuller, on middle. Victor Nyauchi keeps it out.
Quicker now, fuller, just outside off. Richard Ngarava drives it toward long off for one.
Full, on off. Richard Ngarava blocks it back to the bowler.
Short, at the stumps. Richard Ngarava tickles it toward deep mid-wicket and gets a single.
Shortish, on middle and leg. Richard Ngarava goes deep into the crease and dabs it down to the track.
Pitches it up, on the pad of the batter. Richard Ngarava tucks it toward his leg side.
Flat and quick on middle-leg, Victor Nyauchi clips it away to the right of square leg for a single.
Short and outside off, Richard Ngarava punches it to the left of long-off for a single.
Touch fuller pitching outside off and turning it towards the off stump. Richard Ngarava hangs back and defends it firmly.
Short and on off stump, Victor Nyauchi blocks it off the back foot.
Short and sliding on leg stump, Richard Ngarava looks to defend it as he gets an inside edge towards square leg. Single taken.
Short on pads, Victor Nyauchi works it off his pads towards deep square leg for a single.
full, outside off, Victor Nyauchi plays the push drive to the right of the bowler. No run.
On a length on off, Victor Nyauchi pats it off the back foot to short cover.
Full on off, Victor Nyauchi drives it back to the bowler. No run.
Full on middle, Victor Nyauchi pushes it to the mid on region and sneaks in a single to keep the strike.

Edged and dropped! Nicely bowled by Taijul Islam as he tosses this one up around off, the ball dips and turns away after pitching, as the batter is drawn into the defence. The ball takes the outside edge and goes straight to first slip, who drops a very simple chance. Shadman Islam is the culprit.
Short and on leg, Victor Nyauchi works this one behind square to the right of deep square leg for two runs.
Full, just outside off, Richard Ngarava drives this along the ground to the left of long off for a single.
A touch shorter, turning into the left hander, Richard Ngarava goes on the back foot and plays the push back to the bowler.
Short and turning down leg, Richard Ngarava doesn't play it.
Shorter on off, Victor Nyauchi pushes it without any feet movement, to the left of the bowler.

OUT! STUMPED! Mehidy Hasan Miraz gets his man! Bowls this one slower through the air and a touch shorter in length, Blessing Muzarabani charges down the track to loft it. Perhaps the ball wasn’t that full and Blessing didn't read the length correctly. The ball pitches outside off and turns into the right hander as the ball goes through Muzarabani’s bat and pad. The wicket-keeper, Jaker Ali collects it cleanly and knocks off the stumps. An appeal for stumping is sent upstairs. Third umpire deems that the backfoot is on the line and hence the decision is OUT. Blessing Muzarabani has to go. End of a fun cameo from the tall fast bowler.
Blessing Muzarabani st J Ali b MH Miraz 17 (16b 2x4 1x6)
On a length on middle, Blessing Muzarabani blocks it back to the bowler.
Fuller on off, Richard Ngarava drives this off the front foot down the ground for a single to long off.

Half a shout for LBW but turned down! Seemed to be bat first but Bangladesh have taken the review. Fired in, on a length, on middle, Richard Ngarava lunges to defend and gets an inside edge onto the pads. The UltraEdge confirms that it is bat first. Bangladesh lose their review.
Tossed up, outside off, Richard Ngarava pushes it short cover. No run.
Full on middle, Blessing Muzarabani drives it off the front foot to short cover. No run.

SIX! These two are adding some vital runs here! Tossed up, given a lot of air, Blessing Muzarabani in the kind of mood he is goes for the loft as he swings through the line and hits it well over the long on region for a big six.
Tossed up, on middle, Blessing Muzarabani nicely drives it to short cover. No run.

Slower and fuller, on middle, turning into the left hander. Richard Ngarava plays the forward defense as the ball takes the inside edge and just goes past the forward short leg fielder who puts out his left hand but the ball evades him. Single taken.
On a length on off, Blessing Muzarabani plays the push to the right of short cover, who misfields a bit and that allows the batters to take a single.
Fuller on middle, Richard Ngarava pushes it off the front foot into the leg side to the left of short mid-wicket for a single.

Oh! There's the edge! Mehidy Hasan Miraz bowls this one from wide of the crease with a slanting arm as he creates a bit of an angle on this delivery. This ball lands a touch short on middle stump, and straightens on the off stump as Richard Ngarava is squared up on the back foot defence. The ball goes wide of the first slip fielder and the batters complete a single.
On a length around off, Richard Ngarava blocks it into the off side.
A touch short and slower, Richard Ngarava nicely defends it to the left of silly point as he is well in control of this defensive shot.
A touch full again but the line is on middle, this time. Richard Ngarava again brings his front foot ahead and defends it into the leg side.
A touch fuller on off, Richard Ngarava defends it off the front foot back to the bowler.
Full on middle, Blessing Muzarabani nicely drives this along the ground to long on for a single.
Back of a length, outside off, Ngarava blocks it from the crease, as the ball hits the the splice of his bat. End of a good over for Zimbabwe.
Frustration showing in Nahid Rana's bowling as he bowls this one full and down the leg side. Richard Ngarava doesn't bother playing it.

FOUR! Take that! Richard Ngarava fighting fire with fire here. Nahid Rana goes short on middle, Richard Ngarava was ready for it as he pulls this nicely to the right of deep square leg, who just about gets to the ball but can't stop it as the ball goes for four. Tell you what, that was a proper cricketing shot!

On a length, on off, Richard Ngarava goes for the pull and hits it fairly well as he splits the gap between long on and deep mid-wicket. The call is for two runs and they complete two. This is good running by the two tall pacers.
Slower full length delivery on middle, Blessing Muzarabani drives it down the ground to long on for a single.

FOUR! That one goes over the keeper's head! Nahid Rana goes short and outside off, Blessing Muzarabani swings for the heavens as he goes for the pull. The ball takes the top edge and flies over the keeper's head and runs away to the boundary. The third man fielder did put in a chase, but he couldn't get there in time as the ball hit the boundary cushions.
Again a bit quick and flat around off, Richard Ngarava again defends it solidly off the front foot.
Flatter and quicker, just outside off, Richard Ngarava, who is growing in confidence, defends it solidly into the off side towards point.
SIX! Oh, hello! Tossed up delivery from Mehidy Hasan Miraz asking Richard Ngarava to go big and Richard Ngarava gleefully accepts the offer as he lofts this one over the bowler's head for a big six.
Full on off stump line, Richard Ngarava blocks it off the front foot. No run.
A touch fuller this time, the line is still around off, Richard Ngarava again defends it off the front foot.
A touch shorter on off, Richard Ngarava blocks it into the off side.
On a length on leg stump, Blessing Muzarabani makes some room and just guides it on the bounce towards slip cordon. No run.
FOUR! Finally gets one! Full toss on middle-leg, Blessing Muzarabani goes for the wild slog and gets it off the middle as he pierces the gap between mid-wicket and square leg to pick up four runs.
Good length ball, on middle, Blessing Muzarabani is looking to go big, and is again forced to curb his shot as there is not much room to free his arms. He ends up playing it to mid on.
On a length, on middle-leg, Blessing Muzarabani moves away a bit and looks to go over mid on, but can't quite manage to do it as he doesn't get it anywhere from the middle of the bat.
Short, outside off, Richard Ngarava goes for the pull as he gets it just over the short mid-wicket fielder who jumped up and got a hand on it. Batters manage to get three runs on it.
Good length delivery that seams into the left hander as the ball stays a bit low as well. Richard Ngarava gets an inside edge and it crashes into the pads.
On a length on off, Blessing Muzarabani defends it from his crease.

Drags his length back on this one as Blessing Muzarabani again looks to defend it off the front foot and the ball hits the inner half of his bat and goes just past the forward short leg fielder, who did put out his hand but can't quite manage to cling onto it. Perhaps it wouldn't have carried to him as well.
Full on middle-leg, Blessing Muzarabani pushes it off the front foot to mid on.

OUT! TAKEN! 'Catch it' is the cry and Najmul Hossain Shanto answers the call! Slower through the air from around the wicket by Mehidy, on a nagging length, on off, Wellington Masakadza tries to force it through the off side but does not quite get to the pitch of the ball. Hits it on the rise and it goes low towards short cover where Shanto moves to his left quickly and dives to snaffle the catch. Zimbabwe are now 223/8, leading by 32 runs.
Wellington Masakadza c NH Shanto b MH Miraz 6 (42b 0x4 0x6)
Attacking the front pad, on a length, Wellington Masakadza tucks it to mid-wicket.
Short and on middle, Wellington Masakadza hangs back to keep it out.

Full and at the stumps from around the wicket, Wellington Masakadza whips it to the left of mid on. Nahid Rana gives it a chase and cuts it off as he flicks the ball in just in front of the boundary cushions. Three runs taken. Zimbabwe lead by 32 runs!

A loud shout for LBW but turned down! Nipping away off the deck, on a nagging length, Wellington Masakadza looks to cover the line but plays all around it as the ball goes past the outside edge to hit him on the back pad.
On a back of a length, on middle, Richard Ngarava shovels it towards deep backward square leg for one.
At 128.6 kph, on a back of a length, on off, Richard Ngarava stays back to deal with it but the ball stays low and goes on the bounce to the keeper.
Beaten! Pitched up, going across, Richard Ngarava jabs at the delivery without any foot movement and gets beaten on the outside edge.
On off, on a good length, Richard Ngarava dabs it down from the crease.
Mehidy hangs it up there, inviting the big shot, on off, Richard Ngarava thumps it down the ground to long off for a single.
Drags the length back, on off, Richard Ngarava defends it off the front foot.
Full and on the off stump, Richard Ngarava lunges to defend.

OUT! PLUMB IN FRONT! Mehidy Hasan Miraz breaks through for Bangladesh! Pushed through from over the wicket, flat and on middle, Nyasha Mayavo crouches a bit for the pull but the ball is not that short for the shot. The ball skids through to go under the blade and hits him on the front pad right in front of the stumps. Mayavo walks up to his partner and thinks about a review but he gets timed out before he can make any decision. Nyasha falls for 35 (54). Zimbabwe are now 218/7, leading by 27 runs.
Nyasha Mayavo (wk) lbw MH Miraz 35 (54b 5x4 0x6)
Darted in at the pads, glanced down to deep fine leg for one.
Tossed up, on off, Wellington Masakadza pats it to short cover.
Outside off, on a short of a length, Nyasha Mayavo punches it to the right of deep point for a brace.
On middle and leg, on a good length, nudged to mid-wicket.
Slanting into the pads, on a length, Nyasha Mayavo misses the flick and wears it on the pads.
Hurls it on a hard length, outside off, Nyasha Mayavo shoulders arms.
Drifts into the pads, on a length, Nyasha Mayavo turns it through square leg for a couple.
Lands it in the channel on off, on a good length, left alone by Nyasha Mayavo.
Flat and short, on middle, Wellington Masakadza hangs back to defend.
A bit slower, on off, Wellington Masakadza drives this full ball to cover.
Keeps it full, on off, guided to backward point.
Floated up, on off, pushed back to the bowler.
On off, flat and short, Wellington Masakadza dabs it down on the off side.
Speared in from around the wicket, on a length, Wellington Masakadza clips it to mid-wicket.

FOUR! STREAKY! Again, an edge from the blade of Mayavo, but he gets four runs from it! On a length, outside off. Nyasha Mayavo looks to keep it out but gets a thick outer edge and the ball zips past the gully fielder toward the deep backward point fence for a boundary. That will be TEA ON DAY 2!

Edged but just short! Nyasha Mayavo gets a bit lucky here! Nahid Rana bowls it on a good length, outside off, around seventh stump. Nyasha Mayavo rocks back and attempts to dab it on the off side but gets the connection to his outer edge. The ball drops just short of the fielder at gully.
Short of a length, wide outside off. Nyasha Mayavo leaves it alone.
Fuller, outside off. Nyasha Mayavo drives this one toward mid on.
On a length, on middle and leg, angling in. Nyasha Mayavo is in two minds, whether to clip it toward deep fine leg or block it down, but as he sees the ball straying down leg, he makes a leave.
Hard-length delivery, wide outside off. Nyasha Mayavo isn't interested in offering any shot at it.
Full-length delivery, outside off. Wellington Masakadza lunges and blocks this out.
Drags his length back, on middle, angling it in. Nyasha Mayavo pulls it toward backward square leg for a single.
